failed.maximum:
Options `sides` is capped at 1000 to avoid abuse.
Please try again.
failed.minimum:
Option `sides` is too low. The minimum is 3.
Please try again.

error.default:
An error has occured, please try again
`{error}`
error.unbannable: Either my role is too low to ban this user or they have some sort of magical power.
error.noPermission: You don't have the permission to use this command
error.notGuild: Commands can only be executed within a server.
error.commandError: There was an error while executing this command!

drink.drink01: {user} drank the blue liquid inside the 8ball and died
drink.drink02: {user} drank the blue liquid inside the 8ball and can now see into the future
drink.drink03: {user} drank the blue liquid inside the 8ball and passed out
drink.drink04: {user} drank the blue liquid inside the 8ball and it tasted tangy

impostor.info:
This command allows one to find the "Impostor" among us.
*Please Note that it's literally just a mathmatical calculation that randomly picks "Not"*

kickCommand.unkickable: Either my role is too low to Kick this user or they have some sort of magical power.

giveawayModule.notFound: Unable to find the giveaway you're looking for.

misc.owoWait: Give me just a second senpai-san. I enjoy it when you use me.
misc.xpDisabled: The XP System is disabled through guild settings, a server owner should disable this command.
misc.privacyResponse:
This bot was created by Lockyz Dev, we do not store any user information without prior consent. We also will not store any information for persons under the age of 13 as per Australian law.
By using our services you agree to the use of privatised data needed to access the Discord API. If you would like us to exclude you from any sort of data useage please DM our Admin "Robin Painter" and let them know.

You're welcome to view a more in-depth version of our privacy policy at: <https://lockyzdev.net/privacy>
